special_powers.description: Opposing characters within 6 squares and lower points can't use Stealth.

special_powers.name: I AM EVERYWHERE!
special_powers.description: POWER: Place Green Lantern, God of Light in a square that's within half his speed value, then make an attack.

special_powers.name: MOTHER RING, CAN YOU RESTORE OA?
special_powers.description: Barrier, Impervious. Friendly characters adjacent to Green Lantern, God of Light or one of his Barrier markers modify defense +1.

special_powers.name: I AM LIGHT!
special_powers.description: Enhancement, Ranged Combat Expert. Opposing characters hit by his attacks modify defense -1 this turn.

special_powers.name: GOD OF GODS
special_powers.description: Opposing characters within 6 squares and lower points can't use Probability Control.

special_powers.name: EVERYTHING YOU KNEW, GONE
special_powers.description: Shazam, God of Gods has PROTECTED: Mystics Team Ability.

special_powers.name: SHAZAM!
special_powers.description: Pulse Wave. When Shazam, God of Gods uses it, he has KNOCKBACK.

special_powers.name: GOD OF APOKOLIPS
special_powers.description: Opposing characters within 6 squares and lower points can't reduce damage by more than 1.

special_powers.name: THE OMEGA JUDGEMENT
special_powers.description: Running Shot. When Lex Luthor, God of Apokolips hits with a range attack, after resolutions he may use Telekinesis at no cost to target a hit character.

special_powers.name: APOKOLIPS IS READY FOR ME
special_powers.description: Invincible, Mastermind.

special_powers.name: ALWAYS BEEN A GODDESS OF TRUTH
special_powers.description: Opposing characters within 6 squares and lower points can't use Outwit.

special_powers.name: NEVER GIVE UP
special_powers.description: When a friendly character of 50 points or more is KO'd, give her a Determination token. When Wonder Woman would be KO'd, if she has one or more Determination tokens, instead turn her to click #8 then remove all Determination tokens and heal her that many clicks.

special_powers.name: CAUGHT BETWEEN DARK GOD AND ANTI-GOD
special_powers.description: Modify damage +2 when attacking only characters with the Deity keyword. Opposing characters with the Deity keyword modify damage -2 when attacking Wonder Woman.

special_powers.name: CORRUPT YOUR WILL
special_powers.description: Whenever an opposing character within 6 squares uses Willpower, after resolutions you may heal Grail 1 click.

special_powers.name: GODDESS OF ANTI-LIFE
special_powers.description: Quintessence, range value of 6. , you may deal 1 penetrating damage to all opposing characters within 6 squares.

special_powers.name: EMPOWER YOU TO DESTROY THE ANTI-MONITOR
special_powers.description: Perplex. When Grail uses it and targets another character, you may instead modify all of the target's combat values +2.

special_powers.name: SUMMON THE GETAWAY BALLOON!
special_powers.description: FREE: Once per game, generate a Hot Air Balloon vehicle bystander.

special_powers.name: MY OWN DEATHTRAP: WHAT'S INSIDE THE BOX!
special_powers.description: POWER: Give an adjacent opposing character a Deathtrap token. When a character with a Deathtrap token is given a costed action, after resolutions remove the Deathtrap token and roll a d6. 1-3: (Boxing Glove) Deal that character 1 penetrating damage. 4-6: (Ejector Seat) Choose a direction and knock back that character a number of squares equal to the d6 result.

special_powers.name: FULL THROTTLE AWAY!
special_powers.description: Combat Reflexes, Willpower.
